import { Fragment } from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Disclosure, Menu, Transition } from '@headlessui/react'; import { Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon, ShoppingCartIcon, UserIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { useAuthStore } from '../stores/authStore'; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' '); } export default function Layout({ children }) { const location = useLocation(); const { isAuthenticated, user, logout } = useAuthStore(); const navigation = [ { name: 'Home', href: '/', public: true }, { name: 'About', href: '/about', public: true }, { name: 'Contact', href: '/contact', public: true }, { name: 'Stores', href: '/stores', public: false }, { name: 'Orders', href: '/orders', public: false }, ]; const adminNavigation = [ { name: 'Dashboard', href: '/admin/dashboard' }, { name: 'Products', href: '/admin/products' }, { name: 'Stores', href: '/admin/stores' }, { name: 'Cameras', href: '/admin/cameras' }, { name: 'Users', href: '/admin/users' }, { name: 'Analytics', href: '/admin/analytics' }, ]; return (
{({ open }) => ( <>
{navigation .filter(item => item.public || isAuthenticated) .map(item => ( {item.name} ))} {user?.role === 'admin' && ( Admin {adminNavigation.map(item => ( {({ active }) => ( {item.name} )} ))} )}
{isAuthenticated ? ( <> {({ active }) => ( Your Profile )} {({ active }) => ( )} ) : (
Sign in Sign up
)}
Open main menu {open ? ( ) : ( )}
{navigation .filter(item => item.public || isAuthenticated) .map(item => ( {item.name} ))} {user?.role === 'admin' && adminNavigation.map(item => ( {item.name} ))}
{isAuthenticated ? (
Your Profile Sign out
) : (
Sign in Sign up
)}
)}
{children}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} SmartCart AI. All rights reserved.

); }
